name: Magnetic Tool Holder Storage Organizer: 7-Piece Garage Wall Mount Rack Organization Strip Power Magnet Organizers Mounted Workbench Board Slatwall Van Hanger
short_description: EXCEPTIONAL DURABILITY - Boasting of high-quality alloy steel construction, this Magnetic Tool Holder Storage Organizer provides unmatched sturdiness and longevity. The power magnet strip is a heavy-duty solution for tool organization.

POWERFUL ORGANIZATION - Say goodbye to messy tool boxes and welcome streamlined organization with this Magnetic Tool Holder. It can comfortably house your pliers, wrenches, and screwdrivers, making your workbench more accessible and efficient.

ADAPTIVE DESIGN - This 7-piece storage organizer can be easily mounted on any slatwall, making it an ideal choice for van hangers or shelving units. Its magnetic strips double as a key holder, making it a comprehensive solution for all your storage needs.

HANDY EXTRA - As a magnetic trouser clip, the tool holder can easily attach to your belt, securing screws, bits, and small tools. This makes for efficient work, even in hard-to-reach places. It holds up to 11 kilograms of materials vertically, facilitating effortless tool accessibility.

name: DURATECH 4 Pack 12" Magnetic Tool Holder Strip, Heavy Duty Magnetic Tool Bar, Magnetic Space Saving Tool Organizer with Mounting Screws for Garage, Workshop, Kitchen
short_description: GET RID OF MESSY TOOLBOX: The magnetic tool holder keep your tools and other metal objects organized and in one place. For having a larger weight capacity, you can install multiple magnetic tool bars side by side. Our magnetic tool bar is made of premium alloy steel, which guarantees magnetic tool organizer is sturdy and durable.

EASY TO INSTALL: Simply use the included mounting screw to fix the tool organizer bracket to the wall of your garage, workshop or shed. The magnetic tool holder is also expandable by connecting multiple strips.

name: ALWORKKIT Magnetic Tool Holder 12" (4 Pack) - Wall-Mounted Alloy Steel Organizer Bars for Garage, Workshop, Tools Storage Mounting w/Screws.
short_description: Heavy-Duty Alloy Steel Construction - Crafted from ultra-strong alloy steel, this tool rack delivers unmatched durability and a 10 lb weight capacity. Built to securely hold wrenches, pliers, screwdrivers, and more without bending or warping.

Effortless Wall Installation & Expandable Design - Mount vertically or horizontally in seconds with included hardware. Link multiple rails seamlessly using expansion connectors (sold separately) to create custom storage up to 48 inches.
Super-Strong Magnetic Grip - Industrial-grade magnets instantly secure metal tools in place—no slipping or sliding. Perfect for garages, workshops, kitchens, or garages where quick access matters.
Space-Saving Visual Organization - Keep tools visible and within arm’s reach. Eliminate cluttered drawers and save counter space while maintaining a clean, professional workspace.
Multi-Scene Versatility - Ideal for DIYers, mechanics, and home organizers. Use near workbenches, tool chests, garage doors, or pegboards to optimize vertical storage.
Tool-Free Adjustments - Reposition tools or relocate the entire rack without damage. Compatible with most smooth surfaces including steel panels, drywall, and wood.

name: Magnetic Socket Holder Organizer Set: 6-Piece Detachable 1/2 3/8 1/4 Drive Sockets Storage Tray Magnetic Socket Organizer Tool Box Drawer Tool Box Organizers Storage Metric SAE (Sockets Not Included)

name: Master Magnetics Magnetic Bar Tool Organizer - Easy to Install Magnet Storage Holder for House, Garage, Shed, or Job Site - 30 lb Pull - 12" Wide
short_description: MAGNETIC TOOL ORGANIZER: Declutter your workspace and store wrenches, screwdrivers, knives, and more within easy reach. Ideal for garage storage or as a kitchen knife holder, this magnetic bar keeps your space cleaner, safer, and more efficient.

HEAVY-DUTY MAGNET: This strong magnetic holder, with a 30 lb per inch pull force, easily secures large and small tools. Its slim design delivers powerful holding strength without taking up extra space.

EASY TO INSTALL: Powerful magnets on both sides attach securely to flat metal surfaces with no tools required. To remove, simply pull away from the surface. The holes do not go all the way through and are not intended for hanging.

HIGH-QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Crafted from heavy-duty steel strips, durable plastic, and powerful ceramic magnets, this magnetic organizer provides lasting strength and dependable organization for any workspace.

MASTER MAGNETICS: We are a USA-based company trusted since 1976 for strength, quality, and performance. Our extensive line of affordable, powerful magnets makes tasks easier in homes, workshops, and industrial spaces.
product_description: The Master Magnetics Heavy-Duty Magnetic Tool Holder is the perfect solution for organizing and decluttering your workspace. This magnetic tool holder is 12” wide and features a powerful pull force of up to 30 lbs. per inch. This magnetic bar securely holds large or small tools and metal parts. This multi-functional tool holder is ideal for workshops, garages, manufacturing facilities, and inside your truck or van. Whether you are looking for a magnetic knife holder or a tool rack wall mount, this versatile holder turns spaces into well-organized, efficient areas.

EASY TOOL ACCESS - Maximize your wall space with our magnetic organizer. This tool organizer wall mount is the simple solution to cluttered drawers and garage shelves, allowing you to take stock of your entire collection of steel tools at a glance.
